tppcrpg: The Pokémon PokeCenter Role Playing Game
tppc: The Pokémon PokeCenter Role Playing Game
x: Non-official rating system; 1 'x' historically = Level 2499, 'kx' = thousands of 'x'
gday: Day Golden Pokémon can be created (e.g., August 2nd, Christmas/New Years)
b/o: "Best Offer" auction; offer accepted at original time without reserve
ue: "Unevolved / Ungoldenised"; Pokémon may become Golden later
ug: "Unevolved / Ungoldenised"; Pokémon may become Golden later
ueug: "Unevolved / Ungoldenised"; Pokémon may become Golden later
ue/ug: "Unevolved / Ungoldenised"; Pokémon may become Golden later
e/g: "Evolved or Goldenized"; Pokémon cannot become Golden later
g: "Goldenised" OR "Genderless" depending on context (e.g., Deoxys G 2499). Use with care.
tc: Trainer's Corner forum OR Training Challenge (context-dependent)
htt: Hard To Trade; difficult or undesirable Pokémon
1k: Pokémon level in thousands (1k = Level 1000, 2k = Level 2000, etc.)
base: Lowest level available for a Pokémon
upgrade: Consolidate multiple Pokémon into one valuable Pokémon
downgrade: Split one valuable Pokémon into multiple Pokémon
promo: Promotional Pokémon from team stats (1 per account/week, up to 5 if multiple accounts)
ig: In game; refers to rarity list
